name: The Adventures of Mr Pumpkin (Pyxcia)
description:
"There was a pumpkin maker for Halloween, he always made his usual small and decorated pumpkins, but he decided to make a different one. More robust, old and deformed, Mike spent days doing his project, and when he was finally able to show it to the whole city, he saw his hard work go down the drain. Nobody liked it, everyone humiliated the pumpkin. Mike hid it until everyone left and went to sleep.

I just didn't expect to have a pumpkin head and no body the next morning."

Made by:

Parry (@gabriely_patricia) - Environment

Zecaixola (@zecaixol4) - Sprites

Jopper Olsouz (@jopper.olsouz) - Main character

Rykasi (@rykasi_) - Programmer
